commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Now allows the omission of the local offset or the entire time section.

commits.author: Tom Preston-Werner
commits.summary: Allow literal strings and plus-prefixed numbers in arrays.

commits.author: Tom Preston-Werner
commits.summary: Allow underscores in integers/floats per v0.4.0.

commits.author: Tom Preston-Werner
commits.summary: Allow newline after line-ending backlash in multiline basic strings.

commits.author: Tom Preston-Werner
commits.summary: Add inline tables per TOML v0.4.0.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Allow tables to be in array form

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Support the full range of RFC 3339 dates

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Adds support for multi-line double quote strings as well as both forms of literal strings.
